review: I'm new at a lot of this tech stuff, but I think this is the best thing since they invented vcr's, and very easy to setup and use koodos to Google!

review: Absolutely the coolest, most useful, cheap, yet classy wireless receiver I have ever purchased. Setup is so easy a six year old can do it. Works fantastic if wifi is decent and in good range.Just click buy dude, you wont regret it I promise.
author: Jason Berkovich

review: Very handy device that makes streaming video from your laptop a breeze. It has performed perfectly for me and I love it. Just as long as you understand that it is only really effective for streaming Netflix and Youtube, not casting your screen for web browsing, then you will be happy with it as well.
